page.title: 09'A School Day'by Stephen.
page.content: This morning my dad woke me up at 6.45am. for breakfast.I then had a shower.After that I prepared myself for school.As I had some spare time I played on my dad's computer. I set off for school at 8.15 walking through the fields.It is about half a mile from the school to my house.I arrived at 8.30.At 9.05 I went into our school hall for assembly. At 9.30 Mr.Allan gave us our weekly test.At 10.40 I went out to play until 10.55. I did some work on the Domesday Project until 12.00.I had lunch then I went out to play. At 1.00pm I started studying the local area on a map.I was working on this until 2.20. After play I had drama class. At 3.30 I walked home.I had tea at 5.30 and went bed at 8.45.
